entry.def: An uppercut is a type of punch used in boxing. It is a hard upward blow to the chin.

example.ex: He was knocked down by an uppercut from Eubank.
example.tran: 他被尤班克一记上钩拳击倒在地。

means.word_mean: 1. a swinging blow directed upward (especially at an opponent's chin)
